 - New DepthLayoutManager for depth aware layout of graph
visualization (now the default layout).

This started out as a layout manager specific to acyclic networks, but
it occurred to me as I was writing it that the algorithm I'm using for
depth analysis of acyclic networks
could be applied to cyclic networks with only a minor tweak, with the
result that *all* network visualization in SharpNEAT is now depth
aware. It's actually quite useful in that you can see the broad
structure of networks by sight whereas previously the random position
of nodes largely visually obfuscated the structure.

I'm hoping to improve the layout a bit more by 'relaxing' the node X
positions within each layer such that total connection length is
minimized (and thus highly connected node sub-nets should be drawn
closer together).

SVN URL is:
https://sharpneat.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/sharpneat/trunk/SharpNeatV2

 - Colin
